archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1023
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want provide different mechanisms for a customer to enter a competition, including: Enter now, Enter with free text question, Enter with multiple choice question, click through to enter on third party site

properties.value: [CLm] Various opt in features avaliable in CLM for offers, to be clarified

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
